alert.note: Alert for Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Putnam County through 430 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Eatonton, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Phoenix, Rockville, Rock Eagle 4-H Center, Harmony, Oconee Springs Park, Warfield and Willard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
